references.paper_title: FOSSIL: a software tool for the formal synthesis of Lyapunov functions and barrier certificates using neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduces a software tool for formally synthesizing Lyapunov functions and barrier certificates using neural networks, which is highly relevant to the topic of verifying the safety of neural network controllers.

references.paper_title: Differential dynamic logic for hybrid systems
references.reason: This foundational paper introduces differential dynamic logic (dL), a formal logic used for verifying hybrid systems, which is crucial for the work on verifying the safety of neural network controlled systems.

references.paper_title: Reluplex: An efficient SMT solver for verifying deep neural networks
references.reason: This paper presents Reluplex, an efficient SMT solver specifically designed for verifying deep neural networks, which is directly relevant to the presented verification techniques.

references.paper_title: A formally verified hybrid system for safe advisories in the next-generation airborne collision avoidance system
references.reason: This paper presents a formally verified hybrid system for safe advisories in the next-generation airborne collision avoidance system (ACAS X), serving as a benchmark for evaluating the proposed approach.
